Package jetbrains.mps.core.aspects.feedback.api

Interface FeedbackProvider<C extends Context>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessageProvider<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseMessageProvider
    public interface FeedbackProvider<C extends Context>
    Feedback could be of different sorts: showing messages or underlining smth in the editor or showing the balloons. This interface represents such action (or better, reaction) Such reaction is connected with the triggering ProblemId.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void feedback​(C context)
      if the provider does not apply to the given context, then it might throw IllegalArgumentException.
      ProblemId forProblemId()  
      FeedbackType getType()  

    • Method Detail

      • forProblemId

        @NotNull
ProblemId forProblemId()
        Returns:
        the id of Problem this Feedback is pointing to so if that Problem occurs, the user is supposed to receive this Feedback

      • getType

        @NotNull
FeedbackType getType()
        Returns:
        the sort of your feedback. You can show messages, open error dialogs, underline something, even restart MPS. Presumably, the inheritance works only within the single feedback type, meaning different types do not interact with each other.

      • feedback

        void feedback​(@NotNull
              C context)
        if the provider does not apply to the given context, then it might throw IllegalArgumentException. Otherwise it does some action (=feedback) Namely, that action is supposed to be a reaction to the problem forProblemId()
